There exists ALWAYS the risk of SMS text and MMS Data packets of the signal from your Smartphone being intercepted and hijacked, and taken and read on a “remote Device” by third-party persons who may have hostile intentions. Pay special ATTENTION if your text messages arrive at your friends Smartphone unusually slowly, later than they should do. And especially too, if those newly arrived messages are “out of sequence” from the time and order in which they “left” got sent from, your own Smartphone. One unusual feature that sometimes occurs is when suddenly, for no obvious reason, your smartphone time gets changed, typically by one hour, or the date setting seems to change on its own. This is an incidental outcome arising from your smartphone device being tampered with remotely. One other less common, but an obvious sign, is the “fente” or sim card slot in your smartphone suddenly getting “blocked” but by an outside cause rather than your regular telephone service operator provider. This means someone is trying to isolate you and cut you off from help, and might also be a pre-warning that some sort of wrongdoing is imminent. I strongly recommend to any vulnerable person, that they buy and conceal, a small emergencey telephone handset, with charged battery, somewhere they can reach it in case of emergency. if you are being persistently targeted by a criminal, there is a reason, and you could be in real danger. Make so that it is you can call for help and get away from the area. Tell a friend immediately if anything like this happens. it is rare, but it is also serious. Beware because this is a sure sign you are being targeted.if an entire document or email suddenly dissapears while you are working on it, or, when you click on a well known friends e mail, the whole email also vanishes, again, THIS IS A CERTAIN SIGN of illegal and wrongfull computer actions carried out by criminals. These are clear warning signs that an OP Point has been inserted somewhere between YOU and everyone “else” in the public Domain.Data headers, contained in web browser lines, (the long lines and numbers in the web navigation bar) can give a certain amount of clues, and you should read them carefully. (the Book How to set up and run a web site 4th Edition, gives the break down of this information and how to interpret it.) Lutgens, Mathew Pepe, and Kevin Mandia, published by Mr Graw Hill Education”. and several other good quality computer and internet type security books, and got down to work to study the audit trail. It took bloody weeks, but after the trouble, we had all had, it was worth It on THIS occasion. But I caution, it is often BETTER if possible, to simply create a ALL NEW Informatic environment, system, rather than to spend long tiresome hours and weeks of days searching through server and browser and log file informations…YAWNNNNN very boring!!!!! It is really better not to link or attach files or devices of your smartphones to internet connection or wifi connected computers. Once your details are out there, you just dont know who has them anymore. They were, of course, a stay at home all day weirdo computer freak, and trying to get them busted was sadly impossible because he claimed “mental illness”!!!!! Clever enough to horrify everybody, run several busy computers and with a bedroom that looked like Jodrell bank or NASA, write strange things, and hack our computer email, try to make trouble with my lawyers, yet “not fit to be detained”???? !!!!! Rubbish in my view. The laws about data theft need urgent review!!!! Same for Smartphones, nowadays nearly as powerful a gadget as a computer after all. The computer misuse act is a noble piece of legislation, but only vulnerable people respect this law. However, be aware, professional hackers also KNOW the same things, and it has not been unheard off for finaly the Federal Agency or the Police to arrive, at the location, only to discover a laptop inside an old truck or abandoned building, and NO person. They “bounce” the data and signals halfway around the world and you have been clever enough to reach just one end of the “octopus” of their data theft and fraud.Echoes on your telephone during conversations are also a sure sign especially concerned when for example, photographs, or emails, or documents “somehow” vanish from your folders, or files. Or you suddenly find you cannot log on to a social media or known and frequently used site. It strongly implies someone has stolen through “phishing” your smartphone passwords. Check your social media urgently, if you suspect data theft on your smartphone, because it is not unknown for criminal persons, with a malicious nature, to attack, steal, or try to delete, destroy, the albums or articles you have written on media sites. If you are an International business person, and own copyrights, or some intellectual property, be especially prudent to secure the information. Personally, I do NOT recommend storage of Intellectual property on a Tablet or Smartphone for this reason. But please read below for alternative, higher security methods to safeguard personal or Corporate data, by using HIGH SECURITY FEATURED surveillance proof smartphones in urgency, I can only recommend you change your telephone handset (and IP address) every week or so until you can get rid of them because it takes apparently a week for a hacker team to realign their equipment to Monitor you again. But stay ahead of the “game” because technology is always changing rapidly, and what was impossible yesterday might happen tomorrow. I became aware of this due to certain “similar” events, on my then ordinary BT telephone. I knew a civil servant, recently retired, who checked and confirmed that i was being eavesdropped. Which is what from the odd calls, and noise on the line I had suspected for some time. Be suspicious, this again tells you things are not normal.And by the way, the ONLY LEGAL AUTHORISATION TO TAP A PHONE WIRE HAS TO BE ISSUED BY THE UK GOVERNMENT HOME OFFICE. BEWARE!!! Warning. And hiring a Private eye detective, another way, is also highly expensive and time-consuming. An ounce of prevention is a better way than a pound of cure.If you become aware of any “irregularities” and unusual people vehicles or events, and believe you are being targeted, keep a diary, tell a friend, IF you can take discreet photos of persons hanging around, change your shopping and leisure routines and places, and try to “randomize” your activity.where possible, to confuse them and shake them off your trail. Take Legal Advice from an Advocate qualified in the Legal field you need.Make arrangements to improve the safety and security of your home. Consider your recent activity, to see if you can discover where you have acquired your two-legged problems from. Make changes. See if the “problem” walks. If not, take further steps. Buying a high-security mobile phone, such as a TAIGA or a similar type, that is supposed to be surveillance and data theft proof is another better option. If i buy a high-security smartphone enxt time, it will save me alone, personaly, a MONTH of wasted and aggravating time every year currently lost fooling around because of someones cyber crimes…and repairng the problems caused.
